org.edg.data.replication.optorsim

Class GridDataThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.GridDataThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GridDataThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class creates the grid instance thread which shall source statistical values at regular intervals in real time from the statistics objects of each of the elements present on this grid. Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Method to start the grid thread. This method accumulates data at regular intervals.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Method to pause the accumulation of data, by setting the paused variable to true.

      • unPause

        public void unPause()
        Method to unpause the accumulation of data, by setting the paused variable to false.

      • setSampleRate

        public void setSampleRate(float rate)
        Method to rate of accumulation of data, by setting the sampling delay.

      • changePrintingAll

        public void changePrintingAll()
        Method to establish whether user is saving all charts. It does this by changing the printingAll status.

      • currView

        public void currView(java.lang.String currViewingNode)
        Method to determine whether user is attempting to view this objects statistics. If they are not then it is pointless passing over the set of dataseries to GUI class
        Parameters:
        currViewingNode - node on tree that user is currently viewing

      • sendDatatoGUI

        public void sendDatatoGUI()
        Method to pass dataSeries over to the GUI class by calling relevant methods.

      • setNoOfJobs

        public static void setNoOfJobs(int jobNumber)
        Method to set the number of jobs in simulation run. So when jobs completed = noOfJobs, GUI can be notified.
        Parameters:
        jobNumber - number of jobs simulation has to execute

      • falsifyProcessingJobs

        public static void falsifyProcessingJobs()
        Method to stop thread accumulating any more stats by setting processingJobs to false.
